pci_projects_project_storages_cold_archi: You are about to restore your data from the {{containerName}} archive.
Cold Archive has a minimum storage duration of 180 days.
Restoring data within this 180-day period incurs additional costs equal to the restore costs, plus active storage costs for restored objects, plus current archived storage costs.

Restoring the {{containerName}} archive... The time it takes for restored data to become available depends on the volume of data being restored. For a recovery of several hundred TB, for example, the average time is 48 hours. For a volume of a few TB, it can take between a few minutes and a few hours.
